name: Focus and Fire
description:
Watch the screen carefully to click the right buttons before they vanish. Try to get the highest score.

This game was made in 2 days for the Weekly Game Jam # 151 with the theme of 'Olympic Games'. This is my first participating in a game jam, I hope you enjoy.

The only thing you need for this game is a mouse and skill.

Sorry the full screen doesn't work I'm still very new at itch.io and uploading games.
